Articles.Content:
Ok, I have done my due diligence, I have looked everywhere but I can't find info on how to get ahold of old Flight Data. I know pressing F3 will pull it up for vessels in flight, but what about recovered vessels? Is there a way? Thanks!

Edited June 24, 2014 by NavarreVal
resolved
Once a flight has been recovered there is no way to get the old data. (And I'm not entirely sure why you would want to)
Okay, I'm pretty sure Taki is correct, however, may there or may there not be a "mod" for this?

There may be a mod to save flight data and allow you to recover it for anything in the future, I'm not sure.

But all your previous ones have been deleted.

Ok, thanks all, that's what I was worried about! I'm doing a sort of let's play blog kinda thing, and I like to use the flight data for a portion of it but no big. I'll mark it as classified

I found an old flight data mod (black box I think) that still seems to work, so I'm testing that out. Thanks again!
